meanings.sent1: The ghostly figure moved hauntingly through the abandoned house.
meanings.sent2: The eerie melody played hauntingly in the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The spooky movie made us laugh as the characters moved hauntingly.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her lost love lingered hauntingly in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The hauntingly beautiful sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of sadness or fear because of being remembered or experienced in the past
meanings.sent1: The hauntingly familiar scent brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had a hauntingly desolate atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The old photograph looked hauntingly out of place among the modern ones.
meanings.sent4: The hauntingly quiet graveyard echoed with the whispers of the past.
meanings.sent5: The hauntingly empty streets evoked a sense of loneliness and nostalgia.
